summary.span: 一个容器时间线，该时间线为子动画提供对象和属性确定信息。

span.span: A container timeline that provides object and property targeting information for its child animations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 以交互方式控制情节提要Interactively Controlling Storyboards 可控制情节提要可以暂停、 恢复、 查找、 停止和删除。A controllable storyboard can pause, resume, seek, stop, and be removed. 若要使情节提要可以控制在标记中，您可以指定的属性对象，将创建它; 有关示例，请参阅[如何：使用事件触发器来控制情节提要启动后](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。To make a storyboard controllable in markup, you specify the property of the object that creates it; for an example, see [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md). 若要使情节提要可以控制在代码中，必须使用情节提要的适当重载方法并指定`true`以使其可以控制。To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's method and specify `true` to make it controllable. 有关示例，请参见 [如何：控制演示图板启动后](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md). ## 数据绑定和动画时间线Data Binding and Animating Timelines 大多数时间线属性可以是数据绑定或动画处理;但是，由于计时系统工作的方式，数据绑定或动画时间线不类似于其他数据绑定或动画处理的对象。Most timeline properties can be data bound or animated; however, because of the way the timing system works, data bound or animated timelines do not behave like other data bound or animated objects. 若要了解它们的行为，最好先了解一下激活时间线的含义。To understand their behavior, it helps to understand what it means to activate a timeline. 激活时间线时，副本由时间线及其子时间线的副本。When a timeline is activated, copies are made of the timeline and its child timelines. 这些副本均已冻结 （使只读的） 和根据它们来创建对象。These copies are frozen (made read-only) and objects are created from them. 这些时钟将执行对目标属性进行动画处理的实际工作。These clocks do the actual work of animating the targeted properties. 如果数据绑定或进行动画处理，其当前值的快照由创建它的时钟时，时间线。If a timeline is data bound or animated, a snapshot of its current values is made when its clock is created. 即使原始时间线可能会继续更改，其时钟却没有。Even though the original timeline might continue to change, its clock does not. 时间线以反映数据绑定或动画更改，必须重新创建它的时钟。For a timeline to reflect data binding or animation changes, its clock must be re-created. 时钟不会重新为你自动创建。Clocks are not re-created for you automatically. 以下是应用时间线更改的几种方法：The following are several ways to apply timeline changes: - 如果时间线是或属于，你可以使其通过重新应用其情节提要使用反映更改或方法。If the timeline is or belongs to a , you can make it reflect changes by reapplying its storyboard using a or the method. 这还会产生重新启动动画的附带影响。This has the side effect of also restarting the animation. 在代码中，可以使用方法将情节提要回其之前的位置。In code, you can use the method to advance the storyboard back to its previous position. - 如果您将动画应用于属性使用直接方法中，调用再次方法并将其传递已修改的动画。If you applied an animation directly to a property using the method, call the method again and pass it the animation that has been modified. - 如果您正在直接在时钟级别上，创建和应用一组新的时钟，并使用它们来替换以前创建的时钟的集。If you are working directly at the clock level, create and apply a new set of clocks and use them to replace the previous set of created clocks. 有关数据的示例绑定动画，请参见[密钥样条动画示例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011)。For an example of a data bound animation, see [Key Spline Animation Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011) .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当应用， ，或属性使用 ，则所有之前与该属性相关联的对象继续消耗系统资源时，计时系统不自动删除这些时钟。When you apply a , , or to a property using the , any objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system does not remove these clocks automatically. 若要避免出现性能问题时应用大量时钟使用，它们完成后，您应该从属性的基值删除组合时钟。To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using , you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete. 删除时钟有多种方法。There are several ways to remove a clock. - 若要从属性中删除所有时钟，请使用或经过动画处理的对象的方法。To remove all clocks from a property, use the or method of the animated object. 指定要进行动画处理的第一个参数的属性和`null`为第二个。Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second. 这将从属性中删除所有的动画时钟。This removes all animation clocks from the property. - 若要删除特定从列表中的时钟，使用属性检索，然后调用方法。To remove a specific from a list of clocks, use the property of the to retrieve a , then call the method of the . 这通常是时钟的事件处理程序。This is typically done in the event handler for a clock. 请注意，只有根时钟可以受;属性的子时钟返回`null`。Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a ; the property of a child clock returns `null`. 另请注意，如果时钟的有效持续时间将永远不调用事件。Note also that the event is not called if the effective duration of the clock is forever. 在这种情况下，用户必须确定何时调用。In that case, the user must determine when to call . 此动画问题主要出现在生存期较长的对象上。This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime. 垃圾回收对象时，它的时钟也会断开连接和垃圾回收。When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected. 有关时钟对象的详细信息，请参阅[动画和计时系统概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md)。For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md). ## Examples 下面的示例使用进行动画处理时在用户左键单击，并用户单击鼠标右键时。The following example uses the to animate when the user left-clicks, and the when the user right-clicks. [!code-csharp[StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip#FrameworkContentElementStoryboardWithHandoffBehaviorExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip/CSharp/FrameworkContentElementStoryboardWithHandoffBehaviorExample.cs#frameworkcontentelementstoryboardwithhandoffbehaviorexamplewholepage)] [!code-vb[StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip#FrameworkContentElementStoryboardWithHandoffBehaviorExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip/visualbasic/frameworkcontentelementstoryboardwithhandoffbehaviorexample.vb#frameworkcontentelementstoryboardwithhandoffbehaviorexamplewholepage)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目标的属性已进行动画处理，则会使用指定的切换行为。If the targeted properties are already animated, they are replaced using the specified handoff behavior. 若要以交互方式控制此情节提要，必须指定相同`containingObject`时调用的交互式方法用于开始情节提要To interactively control this storyboard, you must specify the same `containingObject` when calling the interactive methods that you used to begin the storyboard 调用此方法时，情节提要和它所包含的任何时间线创建对象。When this method is called, objects are created for the storyboard and any timelines it contains. 这些时钟与`containingObject`。These clocks are stored with `containingObject`. 从情节提要触发器和事件。Beginning a storyboard triggers the and events. ## 使用组合 HandoffBehaviorUsing the Compose HandoffBehavior 当应用， ，或属性使用 ，则所有之前与该属性相关联的对象继续消耗系统资源时，计时系统不自动删除这些时钟。When you apply a , , or to a property using the , any objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system does not remove these clocks automatically. 若要避免出现性能问题时应用大量时钟使用，它们完成后，您应该从属性的基值删除组合时钟。To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using , you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete. 删除时钟有多种方法。There are several ways to remove a clock. - 若要从属性中删除所有时钟，请使用或经过动画处理的对象的方法。To remove all clocks from a property, use the or method of the animated object. 指定要进行动画处理的第一个参数的属性和`null`为第二个。Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second. 这将从属性中删除所有的动画时钟。This removes all animation clocks from the property. - 若要删除特定从列表中的时钟，使用属性检索，然后调用方法。To remove a specific from a list of clocks, use the property of the to retrieve a , then call the method of the . 这通常是时钟的事件处理程序。This is typically done in the event handler for a clock. 请注意，只有根时钟可以受;属性的子时钟返回`null`。Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a ; the property of a child clock returns `null`. 另请注意，如果时钟的有效持续时间将永远不调用事件。Note also that the event is not called if the effective duration of the clock is forever. 在这种情况下，用户必须确定何时调用。In that case, the user must determine when to call . 此动画问题主要出现在生存期较长的对象上。This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime. 垃圾回收对象时，它的时钟也会断开连接和垃圾回收。When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected. 有关时钟对象的详细信息，请参阅[动画和计时系统概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md)。For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md). ## Examples 下面的示例使用可控制演示图板进行动画处理。The following example uses a controllable storyboard to animate a . 包含在的命名作用域。The is contained within a 's name scope. [!code-csharp[StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip#FrameworkContentElementControlStoryboardExampleUsingWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip/CSharp/FrameworkContentElementControlStoryboardExample.cs#frameworkcontentelementcontrolstoryboardexampleusingwholepage)] [!code-vb[StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip#FrameworkContentElementControlStoryboardExampleUsingWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip/visualbasic/frameworkcontentelementcontrolstoryboardexample.vb#frameworkcontentelementcontrolstoryboardexampleusingwholepage)] 下面的示例使用进行动画处理时在用户左键单击，并用户单击鼠标右键时。The next example uses the to animate when the user left-clicks, and the when the user right-clicks. [!code-csharp[StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip#FrameworkContentElementStoryboardWithHandoffBehaviorExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip/CSharp/FrameworkContentElementStoryboardWithHandoffBehaviorExample.cs#frameworkcontentelementstoryboardwithhandoffbehaviorexamplewholepage)] [!code-vb[StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip#FrameworkContentElementStoryboardWithHandoffBehaviorExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip/visualbasic/frameworkcontentelementstoryboardwithhandoffbehaviorexample.vb#frameworkcontentelementstoryboardwithhandoffbehaviorexamplewholepage)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法暂停情节提要，但如果不是活动或暂停当前已无明显的效果。This method pauses the storyboard, but has no discernible effect if it is not active or currently paused. 产生了负面影响，它还会暂停所有关联的子项。As a side effect, all associated children are also paused. 可控制情节提要可以暂停、 恢复、 查找、 停止和删除。A controllable storyboard can pause, resume, seek, stop, and be removed. 若要使情节提要可以控制在代码中，必须使用情节提要的适当重载方法并指定`true`以使其可以控制。To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's method and specify `true` to make it controllable. 有关示例，请参见 [如何：控制演示图板启动后](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md). ## 从暂停的情节提要Beginning a Paused Storyboard 当您已暂停情节提要，它显示为恢复并重新启动。When you a storyboard that was paused, it appears to resume and restart. 但是，这是实际情况并非如此。However, that is not what actually happens. 方法实际上会暂停使用新的未暂停版本。The method actually replaces the paused with a new unpaused version. 每次方法调用时，时钟对象创建的情节提要。Each time the method is called, clock objects are created for the storyboard. 这些时钟分配给它们进行动画处理的属性。These clocks are distributed to the properties they animate. 因此，当调用方法同样，不重新启动它的时钟，并将它们替换用新时钟。So, when the method is called again, it does not restart its clocks; it replaces them with new clocks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法暂停情节提要，但如果不是活动或暂停当前已无明显的效果。This method pauses the storyboard, but has no discernible effect if it is not active or currently paused. 产生了负面影响，它还会暂停所有关联的子项。As a side effect, all associated children are also paused. 查找暂停的情节提要不会恢复它。Seeking a paused storyboard does not resume it. 恢复暂停的情节提要的唯一方法是使用方法。The only way to resume a paused storyboard is to use the method. 调用方法再次暂停的情节提要会替换为一个新的活动，具有恢复它的外观。Calling the method again replaces the paused storyboard with a new one, which has the appearance of resuming it. 若要以交互方式控制此情节提要，必须使用相同`containingObject`参数调用用于开始情节提要的交互式方法时。To interactively control this storyboard, you must use the same `containingObject` parameter when calling the interactive methods that you used to begin the storyboard. 可控制情节提要可以暂停、 恢复、 查找、 停止和删除。A controllable storyboard can pause, resume, seek, stop, and be removed. 若要使情节提要可以控制在代码中，必须使用情节提要的适当重载方法并指定`true`以使其可以控制。To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's method and specify `true` to make it controllable. 从示例，请参阅[如何：控制演示图板启动后](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。Fro an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md). 暂停演示图板的时钟将触发事件。Pausing a storyboard's clock triggers the event. ## 从暂停的情节提要Beginning a Paused Storyboard 当您已暂停情节提要，它显示为恢复并重新启动。When you a storyboard that was paused, it appears to resume and restart. 但是，这是实际情况并非如此。However, that is not what actually happens. 方法实际上是替换了本身未暂停的版本。The method actually replaces itself with an unpaused version. 每次方法调用时，时钟对象创建的情节提要。Each time the method is called, clock objects are created for the storyboard. 这些时钟分配给它们进行动画处理的属性。These clocks are distributed to the properties they animate. 因此，当调用方法同样，不重新启动它的时钟，并将它们替换用新时钟。So, when the method is called again, it does not restart its clocks; it replaces them with new clocks. ## Examples 下面的示例使用可控制演示图板进行动画处理。The following example uses a controllable storyboard to animate a . 包含在的命名作用域。The is contained within a 's name scope. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可控制情节提要可以暂停、 恢复、 查找、 停止和删除。A controllable storyboard can pause, resume, seek, stop, and be removed. 若要使情节提要可以控制在代码中，必须使用情节提要的适当重载方法并指定`true`以使其可以控制。To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's method and specify `true` to make it controllable. 有关示例，请参见 [如何：控制演示图板启动后](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md). 对所执行的所有交互操作，并因此同样，在，计时引擎，这种情况下一步呈现之前短暂发生的下一计时周期发生。All interactive actions taken on a , and therefore also on a , occur on the next tick of the timing engine, which happens shortly before the next render. 这意味着，方法仍在此之前将影响动画的属性。This means that the method still affects the animated properties until this time. 换而言之下, 一次显示帧，则会删除情节提要。In other words, the next time the frame is displayed, the storyboard is removed. 如果需要取消此时间之前从属性动画的关联，请使用方法替换`animation`的参数值`null`。If you need to disassociate an animation from a property before this time, use the method with an `animation` parameter value of `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 恢复未暂停的情节提要没有任何影响。Resuming a storyboard that is not paused has no effect. 若要以交互方式控制此情节提要，必须使用相同`containingObject`参数调用用于开始情节提要的交互式方法时。To interactively control this storyboard, you must use the same `containingObject` parameter when calling the interactive methods that you used to begin the storyboard. 可控制情节提要可以暂停、 恢复、 查找、 停止和删除。A controllable storyboard can pause, resume, seek, stop, and be removed. 若要使情节提要可以控制在代码中，必须使用情节提要的适当重载方法并指定`true`以使其可以控制。To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's method and specify `true` to make it controllable. 有关示例，请参见 [如何：控制演示图板启动后](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md). 查找暂停的情节提要不会恢复它。Seeking a paused storyboard does not resume it. 恢复暂停的情节提要的唯一方法是使用方法。The only way to resume a paused storyboard is to use the method. 调用方法情节提要启动后将替换旧情节提要，具有恢复它的外观。Calling the method after the storyboard has started replaces the old storyboard, which has the appearance of resuming it. 恢复暂停的演示图板的时钟触发事件。Resuming a paused a storyboard's clock triggers the event. ## Examples 下面的示例使用可控制演示图板进行动画处理。The following example uses a controllable storyboard to animate a . 包含在的命名作用域。The is contained within a 's name scope. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将推进情节提要的当前时间和结束活动期;情节提要的行为在此时指定通过其设置。This method advances the storyboard's current time to the end of its active period; the storyboard's behavior at this point is specified by its setting. 如果设置为，情节提要填充; 如果该属性设置为，情节提要停止。If is set to , the storyboard fills; if the property is set to , the storyboard stops. 带有无限持续时间在 storyboard 上调用此方法，无限数量的重复项无效。Calling this method on a storyboard with an infinite duration, an infinite number of repetitions has no effect. 在处于非活动状态的情节提要上调用此方法不起作用。Calling this method on an inactive storyboard has no effect. 将时钟至其填充期会触发和事件。Advancing a clock to its fill period triggers the and events. 若要以交互方式控制此情节提要，必须使用相同`containingObject`参数调用用于开始情节提要的交互式方法时。To interactively control this storyboard, you must use the same `containingObject` parameter when calling the interactive methods that you used to begin the storyboard. 可控制情节提要可以暂停、 恢复、 查找、 停止和删除。A controllable storyboard can pause, resume, seek, stop, and be removed. 若要使情节提要可以控制在代码中，必须使用情节提要的适当重载方法并指定`true`以使其可以控制。To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's method and specify `true` to make it controllable. 有关示例，请参见 [如何：控制演示图板启动后](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md). ## Examples 下面的示例使用可控制演示图板进行动画处理。The following example uses a controllable storyboard to animate a . 包含在的命名作用域。The is contained within a 's name scope. remarks.format: ## Remarks 目标对象必须是依赖项对象。The target object must be a dependency object. > [!NOTE] > 属性不是可序列化，因为它可以将设置为任何。The property is not serializable, because it can be set to any . 没有任何保证可以在 XAML 中正确引用该对象。There is no guaranteed that this object can be correctly referenced in XAML. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性是可选的。Setting this property is optional. 如果未指定，情节提要的动画应用于下列情况之一：If the is not specified, a storyboard's animations are applied to one of the following: - 如果使用启动情节提要动画所属，拥有的元素触发情节提要的操作为目标。If the storyboard to which the animation belongs was started using a , the element that owns the action that triggers the storyboard is targeted. - 如果使用启动情节提要方法，或指定当启动情节提要时采用了方法为目标。If the storyboard was started using the method, the or specified when the storyboard was started with the method is targeted. 如果使用子时间线上设置此属性，这些子时间线"继承"的父除非指定其自己。When this property is set on a timeline with children, those child timelines "inherit" the parent's unless they specify their own. ## 使对象作为目标Making an Object Targetable 当使用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，执行以下两个操作，以使对象可通过一个情节提要之一：When using [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], you perform one of the following two actions to make an object targetable by a storyboard: - 如果对象是或，将其属性。If the object is a or a , set its property. - 如果对象是或自定义或，将其分配名称使用[X:name 指令](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md)标记扩展。If the object is a or a custom or , assign it a name using the [x:Name Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md) markup extension. 使用代码时，您使对象可通过使用方法以将对象分配一个名称。When using code, you make an object targetable by using the method to assign the object a name. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|
